content.body: It seems ~pointless to use Bikeshed if we're just writing raw markup instead. You get some small benefits around cross-referencing, but the big one of matching other Bikeshed spec styles and being easier to author is missing. If we just wanted better cross-referencing we could add that to html-build in a few working days I think.
